title: Days of Gold
description: "Days of Gold" is another book full of humor, passion and adventure by Jude Deveraux.Angus McTern enjoys the respect of men and the adoration of women. He takes his duties as the heir of the McTern family very seriously and has everything he wants from life until he meets Edilean Talbot. Beautiful and noble-born Edilean needs Angus' help to recover the gold that her father left her. The gold ends up on a ship that sails to America, but when Angus takes it over, he is accused of kidnapping and theft. So he has to leave everything that is close to him and escape from Edilean to a new country. There they encounter many difficulties that seem insurmountable. However, there, they also meet love, which is as free and wild as the new land.
author: Jude Deveraux
